about.title: About me
about.text_from: I’m Nikolay, a full-steck web developer from Nizniy Novgorod, Russia
about.text_work: I have been working full time at ONLYOFFICE for the past one and half year
about.text_about: I specialize in front end development  and back end development, and I constantly improve my development skills

onlyoffice.positionDescription: My tasks include support of the company's website, support and development of new modules and features of the company's product. I work with HTML, CSS, Less, JavaScript/jQuery , C#, MySQL.

rfnc.positionDescription: Full stack web developer working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery/ExtJS, PHP, MySQL. Responsibilities include designing and developing web application, Linux system administration, back end maintenance.
